import React from 'react'; import { Container, FormControl, InputGroup, Navbar, } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { BsSearch, BsMessenger } from "react-icons/bs"; import { IoNotificationsSharp, IoPeopleCircleOutline, IoMenu } from "react-icons/io5"; import { AiOutlineHome } from "react-icons/ai"; import { FaUserFriends } from "react-icons/fa"; import { MdOutlineOndemandVideo, MdAccountCircle } from "react-icons/md"; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import logo from '../../../image/fb-icon.png'; import './Header.css'; import useAuth from '../../../hooks/useAuth'; const Header = () => { const { user } = useAuth(); return (
{user?.email && user?.displayName}
); }; export default Header;
